game.name: Street Racing Syndicate
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The raw, high-stakes world of illegal street racing comes to life in Street Racing Syndicate. Trick out over 40 authentic licensed cars with parts from over 15 real-world manufacturers, then turn your customized ride loose on the streets of 3 cities across the USA.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The raw, high-stakes world of illegal street racing comes to life in Street Racing Syndicate. Trick out over 40 authentic licensed cars with parts from over 15 real-world manufacturers, then turn your customized ride loose on the streets of 3 cities across the USA.

reviewHighlights.text: A true Steam classic with cool trading cards. Need for Speed on a budget. The online does not work, but still has split screen. Cool brand name cars t...
brings back the 2005 vibes and was ahead of its time and was competive to other brands
